vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
Splitter.newPuppet.newPuppet (local variable @ patch_8.sol#32) shadows:
	- Splitter.newPuppet (function @ patch_8.sol#32-37)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
Splitter._addy should be constant (patch_8.sol#7)
Splitter._count should be constant (patch_8.sol#9)

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Splitter.fundPuppets (patch_8.sol#44-52):
	-require(bool)(extra[0].call.value(_share).gas(800000)()) patch_8.sol#48
	-require(bool)(extra[1].call.value(_share).gas(800000)()) patch_8.sol#49
	-require(bool)(extra[2].call.value(_share).gas(800000)()) patch_8.sol#50
	-require(bool)(extra[3].call.value(_share).gas(800000)()) patch_8.sol#51

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
